ns2:testcase.ns3:title: FS-TD-005/PSA-TD-003-038/Verify that at account level Penalty Calculation rounding has to be done to 2 decimal places/Positive
ns2:testcase.ns3:description: Penalty Calculation must be rounding to 2 decimal places, if at the product level "Interest Rounding Decimals" is selected as "02: Two decimal places". Explanation: Decimal numbers must be two number e.g 0.00 Success Criteria: Penalty Calculation rounds off to the two decimal place.
ns2:testcase.ns3:creator: v070382
